けんこうしょうめいしょ

r_ele.r: ぼしけんこうてちょう

sense.gloss: maternal and child health notebook, maternity health record book
good for the health, healthy, wholesome
to harm one's health, to injure one's health, to be harmful to one's health
health management, health maintenance, health care
